title: Technology Readiness Levels
description: Controlled vocabulary for Technology Readiness Levels (TRL) as used in Horizon Europe and other research frameworks

levels.label: TRL 3 - Experimental proof of concept
levels.description: Analytical and experimental critical function and/or characteristic proof of concept

levels.label: TRL 4 - Technology validated in lab
levels.description: Component and/or breadboard validation in laboratory environment

levels.label: TRL 5 - Technology validated in relevant environment
levels.description: Component and/or breadboard validation in relevant environment

levels.label: TRL 6 - Technology demonstrated in relevant environment
levels.description: System/subsystem model or prototype demonstration in a relevant environment

levels.label: TRL 7 - System prototype demonstration in operational environment
levels.description: System prototype demonstration in an operational environment

levels.label: TRL 9 - Actual system proven in operational environment
levels.description: Actual system proven in operational environment
